articles.title: This hidden Samsung Galaxy trick could make your Android phone much faster - Express
articles.description: IF you're looking to squeeze every ounce of performance out of your Samsung Galaxy handset, then you should a new tip that will make one of the most common tasks on your Android smartphone feel much, much faster.

But if you want to try it out for yourself then you just need to follow a few simple steps. To start with, open Settings on your Samsung Galaxy device and then go to Apps.
